product.title: Japanese Steamed Bun Shop Building Blocks
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • The most detailed Japanese Steamed Bun Shop you'll ever build

    Challenge your crafting skills and recreate an authentic Japanese Store selling steamed buns that can light your room up. Turn your room into a Japanese haven with this amazing set along with our large collection of Japanese building blocks. Once you have completed this building you can easily open the back wall to access the kitchen on the ground floor and a room upstairs.

    ✨ Measures about 5x6x9in / 12x15x24cm
    ✨ Compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm)
    ✨ Over 1100 pieces
    ✨ LED Light included
    📦 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    There is a matching set called Kawaii Japanese Coffee Store Building Set, here is the link Kawaii Japanese Coffee Store Building Set

    The perfect gift for those who love their crafts!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement if you are planning to get this awesome set for them so let's leave an everlasting smile on your loved ones.


    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow. 

    Features

    ✨ 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    ✨ Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    ✨ Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all ages
    ✨ High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Are these compatible with other leading brands? Yes, these are traditional/standard-sized blocks so they are compatible with other leading brands.

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

     

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
